name: Awakening the power of the roots
name_original: Awakening the power of the roots
description: This is a story about a soldier of the armed forces of Ukraine. In the battle near the city of Bakhmut, he was seriously wounded, but his ancestor, his grandfather, came to him. He told him the stories of heroic struggle against the occupiers during the time of the Ukrainian People's Republic, and it gave him a lot of strength. This game was developed by students of the Ukrainian game development school "Headlight School" MADE IN UKRAINE
